stitches within brackets until 23 before stitch marker ssk k1 k2tog yo x4 k1 yo ssk x4 k1 k2tog slide marker yo k2tog x3 yo k1 yo ssk x3 yo slide marker repeat stitches within brackets until final 27 stitches ssk k1 k2tog yo x4 k1 yo ssk x4 k1 k2tog yo k2tog k2 353 ts work row 28 very loosely to facilitate the bind off row chain = insert lh needle into front of stitch on rh needle k1 cast off = pass 1st stitch on rh needle over 2nd and off the needle row 29 k4tog chain 3 sl2k1psso cast off 1 * chain 5 pb chain 4 sl2k1psso cast off 1 x 6 chain 3 sl2k1psso cast off 1 chain 3 sl2k1psso cast off 1 * repeat from * to * until stitch marker chain 5 pb chain 4 sl2k1psso cast off 1 x6 repeat from * to * until final 22 stitches chain 5 pb chain 4 sl2k1psso cast off 1 x6 chain 3 k4tog cast off 1 break yarn and pull through final stitch stockinette haruni © emily ross page 8 of 9 acknowledgments i would like to thank my husband brian prince charming for his wonderful design layout photography and editing this would not have been possible without his help i ve tried to make this pattern as accurate as possible but if you find any errors or have questions there is pattern
